channel.title: Twilio on Simon Gilbert Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Twilio on Simon Gilbert Blog

item.title: Cross-Platform SMS RESTful Api using Twilio - C# ASP.Net Core Web Api
item.description: Looking to send SMS to your users? Simon Gilbert discusses how to construct a cross-platform RESTful API for sending SMS messages using the Twilio platform and C# ASP.Net Core Web Api in Visual Studio for Mac.
